title: Senior Project Manager
location: Wider NSW (with occasional travel to Sydney or Port Macquarie)
benefits: Flexible work-from-home options, competitive daily pay, professional development opportunities, exposure to high-impact projects across NSW Government
description: Lead complex projects in the energy and utilities sector across multiple business units.
Manage project finances, schedules, risks, and organisational change initiatives.
Collaborate with IT vendors and diverse technical teams to deliver outcomes.
Develop executive-level reporting and influence stakeholders to drive project success.
